insert into tran_list (user_id, tran_date, tran_time, tran_type, tran_seq, host_code, host_msg, host_ip, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tran_list set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tran_date = #{tranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_time = #{tranTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_type = #{tranType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_seq = #{tranSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, host_code = #{hostCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, host_msg = #{hostMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, host_ip = #{hostIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tran_id = #{tranId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tran_id, user_id, tran_date, tran_time, tran_type, tran_seq, host_code, host_msg, host_ip, create_time, update_time from tran_list where tran_id = #{tranId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
